text: Salamanca is a Chilean city and commune in Choapa Province in the Coquimbo Region. It is located 30 km east of Illapel, the province's capital and administrative center, and 316 km north of Santiago. It is normally accessed from Los Vilos, which lies next to the Panamerican Highway, and connects the city to the rest of the country. Category:Cities in Chile Category:Coquimbo Region
title: Salamanca, Chile
